## Log into instance

Prerequisites:

To log into your instance, you need to have created your

- [Key pairs](key-pairs-create.md)
- [Instance](instance-create.md)


## Terminal

### Mac

Change the IP adress and enter

```bash
ssh -i .ssh/id_rsa ubuntu@193.196.52.36
```

If you are asked: Are you sure you want to continue connecting (yes/no/[fingerprint])? 

Enter "yes".

Enter passphrase for key '.ssh/id_rsa':

Provide your password
